data.title: Two New NBA Coaching Hires Create Unwanted Controversy For A Progressive League
data.meta_description: The Portland Trailblazers and Dallas Mavericks have hired new coaches with stellar records as players â€” but questionable off-court problems. The moves have roiled the typically progressive NBA.

Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.
